column1: Fuiyáru was a deadly nightshade that grew about the Halls of Mandos. It is said to have been particularly abundant before the doors of Nienna.

column2: likely a literal translation of "nightshade". Its composition probably relates to the elements Fui (also hui) "fog
column7: blight". The Gnomish name of the flower was Fuior.

column1: Patrick H. Wynne has identified the flower as the Wikipedia:Atropa belladonna.
